      • registerService

        public static void registerService(IKernelServiceProvider service)
        Register the kernel provider service.

        Calls IKernelServiceProvider.setId(short) with its identifier.

        Parameters:
        service - the kernel provider service to register.

      • getService0

        public static IKernelServiceProvider getService0(long liveId)
                                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Get the kernel provider service for a live id.

        Returns null if the service provider is no longer registered.

        Parameters:
        liveId - a live id
        Returns:
        the kernel provider service or null if the service has been unregistered.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
